blog.name: bixbiboom
blog.title: I myself am also Enchanter Pumat Sol
blog.description:
Bixbi, older than you.

Fat queer of indeterminate origin.

Possibly a lesser demon.

Hellenist serving Hestia, Hermes and Chiron.

Critical Role has taken over my life and my blog.

Taliesin Jaffe is my boyfriend.

I love you.

#eyesnevershut

blog.name: critroletrash
blog.title: I Am What It Says, Critical Role trash
blog.description: I was annoying folks on my main blog so this is my Critical Role side blog. Join me in my love for these amazing characters and the actors responsible for them.

summary: I have a friend at work that is going to start watching CR after I spent our entire lunch break raving about it. I’m so hyped to...
body:
I have a friend at work that is going to start watching CR after I spent our entire lunch break raving about it. I’m so hyped to finally get a real life friend into this obsession with me. Especially one who WANTS to start at the beginning of Campaign 1!

But apparently I am also a masochist because thinking about Campaign 1 has me rewatching the finale again and I am ugly crying over Vax again. Is it weird I’m excited for my friend to be crying over these characters too?

reblog.comment:

But apparently I am also a masochist because thinking about Campaign 1 has me rewatching the finale again and I am ugly crying over Vax again. Is it weird I’m excited for my friend to be crying over these characters too?

tags: she’s short cause I say soo
also I didn’t actually check the official heights/art cause I didn’t want to be disappointed
summary: What’s everyone’s thoughts on Beau’s height? I feel like I’m the only one who thinks she’s the shortest in the group(other than...
body:
What’s everyone’s thoughts on Beau’s height? I feel like I’m the only one who thinks she’s the shortest in the group(other than Nott of course).

Like not actually short, just like an inch smaller than Jester. Maybe it’s cause I see her being all like ‘I’m totally taller than you’ But literally everyone else in the group can see that’s nott true.

Tl;dr I love short Beau and everyone else should too

summary: A large part of why I love Beau is that she's canonically probably the second youngest of the mighty nein?  all of them are like...
body: A large part of why I love Beau is that she’s canonically probably the second youngest of the mighty nein? all of them are like “she’s probably the most reliable and trustworthy and that’s why she’s my favorite.” and they’re right but she’s also like a 23 year old self-proclaimed disaster lesbian.

tags: readmore contains me talking a lot about the Thoughts behind my various choices for this
in incredibly rambly fashion and with inconsistent Capitalisation bc i typed it up in a text doc and it keeps auto-capitalising stuff
i should probably change the settings for that at some point
but hey anyway HERE HE IS AT LAST!!
this card has been in the works for a While but then i got bored? and then i did nott.
summary: The Magician represents resourcefulness, willpower and potential. This card is numbered One, the number of new beginnings and...
caption:
The Magician represents resourcefulness, willpower and potential. This card is numbered One, the number of new beginnings and opportunities.


there’s not as many things going on in this one as a couple of the others, but… ok enough probably (watch me start with this and continue writing a frickin novel down here). And there was so much going on with the waves and stormy weather i didnt want to clutter it all up too much. I hope the reasons i chose the magician for fjord is maybe evident in the short card summary above, the connection to Uk’otoa, him… being a warlock, i suppose, is a more obvious one. And «potential» is a word i kept reading when looking up information on this card in various places, so it just felt…. right.

The rider-waite deck has the magician holding a wand up to the sky, representing his connection to the spiritual realms, and the other hand down to the earth and the physical realm (or in this case i guess the ocean, which, i dont know if it works as well, since uk’otoa is Of The Ocean, but my other ideas just… didnt look as good or work as well, so im still pretty happy with this. I guess this is more the Literal Ocean, and the falchion is the Spiritual Ocean?). Of course fjord doenst wield a wand, his falchion is his wand of sorts, as well as a direct connection to uk’otoa and the spiritual side of things.

The eternity symbol is all about Unlimited Potential, and, like, that certainly still felt Very Fitting and relevant to keep for my design. And then on the rock table in front of him are Summer’s Dance, the wand of smiles, one of the deity coins they found in the swamp, this one with a symbol of the Storm Lord, and a nice golden cup for dead people tea. These represent the four suites of the tarot, as well as fjord’s connection to his friends. Ofc i couldnt get them all in, so i took. Well i took the summer’s dance because that felt like A Given, very important. Did consume that sword. Is currently using that sword. Molly was his roommate, etcetcetc. And the rest of them, well, maybe if i were to choose which characters were the most important and relevant to fjord (at the moment, anyway) those arent necessarily the ones i would have gone with? Like, jester, sure, but ??? anyway everyone’s probably gonna have different opinions on that anyway, but my point is that they all represent more… his connection to the nein as a whole, rather than necessarily the specific individuals represented? And they are also more… grounded, if that makes sense? In the part of the card that is more about the physical realm, whats right there, around him and with him (in.. various ways).

The reversed (or a reversed, anyway) reading of this card also feels?? relevant to uk’otoa? I suppose. Or to fjord himself. He doesn’t quite know what he is doing, and has ended up maybe fucking up a few times and his friends are definitely a bit worried about where he’s going. And he certainly can’t know for sure what his patron wants from him, if he’s being led somewhere he doesn’t want to be, if there’s trickery and. Well. A whole lot of things. It’s Complicated ™.

Other than that its mostly just, i just wanted the Ocean, Wave, Storm mood? Chaotic around him, but him in Control. So thats what he got!
caption_abstract: The Magician represents resourcefulness, willpower and potential. This card is numbered One, the number of new beginnings and opportunities.

Molly was his roommate, etcetcetc. And the rest of them, well, maybe if i were to choose which characters were the most important and relevant to fjord (at the moment, anyway) those arent necessarily the ones i would have gone with? Like, jester, sure, but ??? anyway everyone’s probably gonna have different opinions on that anyway, but my point is that they all represent more… his connection to the nein as a whole, rather than necessarily the specific individuals represented? And they are also more… grounded, if that makes sense? In the part of the card that is more about the physical realm, whats right there, around him and with him (in.. various ways).

The reversed (or a reversed, anyway) reading of this card also feels?? relevant to uk’otoa? I suppose. Or to fjord himself. He doesn’t quite know what he is doing, and has ended up maybe fucking up a few times and his friends are definitely a bit worried about where he’s going. And he certainly can’t know for sure what his patron wants from him, if he’s being led somewhere he doesn’t want to be, if there’s trickery and. Well. A whole lot of things. It’s Complicated ™.

Other than that its mostly just, i just wanted the Ocean, Wave, Storm mood? Chaotic around him, but him in Control. So thats what he got!
trail.content:
The Magician represents resourcefulness, willpower and potential. This card is numbered One, the number of new beginnings and opportunities.


there’s not as many things going on in this one as a couple of the others, but… ok enough probably (watch me start with this and continue writing a frickin novel down here). And there was so much going on with the waves and stormy weather i didnt want to clutter it all up too much. I hope the reasons i chose the magician for fjord is maybe evident in the short card summary above, the connection to Uk’otoa, him… being a warlock, i suppose, is a more obvious one. And «potential» is a word i kept reading when looking up information on this card in various places, so it just felt…. right.

The rider-waite deck has the magician holding a wand up to the sky, representing his connection to the spiritual realms, and the other hand down to the earth and the physical realm (or in this case i guess the ocean, which, i dont know if it works as well, since uk’otoa is Of The Ocean, but my other ideas just… didnt look as good or work as well, so im still pretty happy with this. I guess this is more the Literal Ocean, and the falchion is the Spiritual Ocean?). Of course fjord doenst wield a wand, his falchion is his wand of sorts, as well as a direct connection to uk’otoa and the spiritual side of things.

The eternity symbol is all about Unlimited Potential, and, like, that certainly still felt Very Fitting and relevant to keep for my design. And then on the rock table in front of him are Summer’s Dance, the wand of smiles, one of the deity coins they found in the swamp, this one with a symbol of the Storm Lord, and a nice golden cup for dead people tea. These represent the four suites of the tarot, as well as fjord’s connection to his friends. Ofc i couldnt get them all in, so i took. Well i took the summer’s dance because that felt like A Given, very important. Did consume that sword. Is currently using that sword. Molly was his roommate, etcetcetc. And the rest of them, well, maybe if i were to choose which characters were the most important and relevant to fjord (at the moment, anyway) those arent necessarily the ones i would have gone with? Like, jester, sure, but ??? anyway everyone’s probably gonna have different opinions on that anyway, but my point is that they all represent more… his connection to the nein as a whole, rather than necessarily the specific individuals represented? And they are also more… grounded, if that makes sense? In the part of the card that is more about the physical realm, whats right there, around him and with him (in.. various ways).

The reversed (or a reversed, anyway) reading of this card also feels?? relevant to uk’otoa? I suppose. Or to fjord himself. He doesn’t quite know what he is doing, and has ended up maybe fucking up a few times and his friends are definitely a bit worried about where he’s going. And he certainly can’t know for sure what his patron wants from him, if he’s being led somewhere he doesn’t want to be, if there’s trickery and. Well. A whole lot of things. It’s Complicated ™.

Other than that its mostly just, i just wanted the Ocean, Wave, Storm mood? Chaotic around him, but him in Control. So thats what he got!
trail.content_abstract: The Magician represents resourcefulness, willpower and potential. This card is numbered One, the number of new beginnings and opportunities.

summary:
Fjord reacting to Caduceus in ep 30 is the FUNNIEST shit
Fjord: Do I smell (weed)? Nah it smells like breakfast, fuck it.
Fjord,...
body:
Fjord reacting to Caduceus in ep 30 is the FUNNIEST shit

Fjord: Do I smell (weed)? Nah it smells like breakfast, fuck it.

Fjord, nodding but panicking internally: Dead people tea. Oh.

Fjord, leaning over to Beau and Caleb: He- he’s alive right?

summary: i had a grand old time drawing jester alongside the latest episode of Pub Draw (and the thordak fight from cr1 lol), and i’m...
caption: i had a grand old time drawing jester alongside the latest episode of Pub Draw (and the thordak fight from cr1 lol), and i’m looking forward to the next one! it was super cool to see babs’ process & give line work & cel shading another go after moving away from it!

reblog.comment: i had a grand old time drawing jester alongside the latest episode of Pub Draw (and the thordak fight from cr1 lol), and i’m looking forward to the next one! it was super cool to see babs’ process & give line work & cel shading another go after moving away from it!

trail.content_raw: i had a grand old time drawing jester alongside the latest episode of Pub Draw (and the thordak fight from cr1 lol), and i’m looking forward to the next one! it was super cool to see babs’ process & give line work & cel shading another go after moving away from it!
